intro: Aichryson bollei, commonly known as the silver beauty or silver star, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It features a compact, rounded shape with dense clusters of fleshy, blue-green leaves that give it a striking silvery appearance. The plant produces small, yellow flowers during the spring and summer months. It is well-suited for rock gardens or as a container plant due to its drought tolerance and low maintenance requirements. Aichryson bollei thrives in full sun and well-draining soil, making it an ideal choice for xeriscaping.
